mapper.select: select PRODUCTTYPE,TT_TARGET,TOTAL_GLS_QTY,PERIODDATE from DWR_PRODUCT_TT_FIDS WHERE FACTORY=#{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRODUCTTYPE=#{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select avg(TT_TARGET) as target,avg(TOTAL_GLS_QTY) as actual,PRODUCTTYPE from DWR_PRODUCT_TT_FIDS WHERE FACTORY=#{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRODUCTTYPE=#{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PERIODDATE >= to_date( to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM')|| '-01','YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_CHAR(PERIODDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') group by PRODUCTTYPE
